response.original_title: The Roller Coasters of Cedar Point
response.overview: Known around the globe as the worldwide leader in roller coasters, Cedar Point is a coaster-lovers dream come true. Whether you crave the tallest and fastest scream machine in the universe, Top Thrill Dragster, high-tech thrills of Millennium Force, or the unpredictability of Raptor, Cedar Point has a coaster for you. This action-packed program will not only give you a brief history of the park's legendary coasters, but will actually give you a front-row seat on some of the best!
response.title: The Roller Coasters of Cedar Point
